# 程式專案完整名稱
Slot_Framework

# 專案主要⽬的及特性描述  

## 主要⽬的 
提供基礎Slot功能給Slot系列作為開發項目。

## 特性描述

# 系統需求
* Cocos Creator v2.4.0

# 基本開發原則及注意要點
## 基本開發原則
* [Code Style](https://gitlab.paradise-soft.com.tw/hydra/gameteam/document/-/blob/master/CodingStyle/CodingStyle.md)
* [Cocos Creator 資源相關命名](https://gitlab.paradise-soft.com.tw/hydra/gameteam/document/-/blob/master/CodingStyle/CocosCodingStyle.md)
## 注意要點
* framework是Slot遊戲的共通功能、或多選功能
* 如有個別遊戲不一樣的處理，請寫在各遊戲內

# 專案架構

* 【Game】
    * [Slot_GameManager (遊戲主邏輯)](https://gitlab.geax.io/demeter/client/document/-/blob/master/Framework/SlotFramework/Game/Slot_GameManager.md)

    * 【Panel】
        * [Slot_FreeGameGetScorePanel (免費遊戲取分頁面)](https://gitlab.geax.io/demeter/client/document/-/blob/master/Framework/SlotFramework/Game/Panel/Slot_FreeGameGetScorePanel.md)
        * [Slot_FreeGamePanel (免費遊戲開始頁面)](https://gitlab.geax.io/demeter/client/document/-/blob/master/Framework/SlotFramework/Game/Panel/Slot_FreeGamePanel.md)
        * [Slot_RulePanel (規則頁面)](https://gitlab.geax.io/demeter/client/document/-/blob/master/Framework/SlotFramework/Game/Panel/Slot_RulePanel.md)
        * [Slot_WinScorePanel (贏錢特效)](https://gitlab.geax.io/demeter/client/document/-/blob/master/Framework/SlotFramework/Game/Panel/Slot_WinScorePanel.md)
        * [Slot_AutoGamePanel (自動遊戲頁面)](https://gitlab.geax.io/demeter/client/document/-/blob/master/Framework/SlotFramework/Game/Panel/Slot_AutoGamePanel.md)

    * 【view】
        * [Slot_GameUI (遊戲UI控制腳本)](https://gitlab.geax.io/demeter/client/document/-/blob/master/Framework/SlotFramework/Game/view/Slot_GameUI.md)
        * [Slot_Line (中獎連線物件)](https://gitlab.geax.io/demeter/client/document/-/blob/master/Framework/SlotFramework/Game/view/Slot_Line.md)
        * [Slot_LineManager (中獎連線 主邏輯)](https://gitlab.geax.io/demeter/client/document/-/blob/master/Framework/SlotFramework/Game/view/Slot_LineManager.md)
        * [Slot_Reel (滾輪物件)](https://gitlab.geax.io/demeter/client/document/-/blob/master/Framework/SlotFramework/Game/view/Slot_Reel.md)
        * [Slot_ReelManager (滾輪 主邏輯)](https://gitlab.geax.io/demeter/client/document/-/blob/master/Framework/SlotFramework/Game/view/Slot_ReelManager.md)
        * [Slot_Symbol (符號物件)](https://gitlab.geax.io/demeter/client/document/-/blob/master/Framework/SlotFramework/Game/view/Slot_Symbol.md)


* 【Lobby】
    * [Slot_LobbyManager (大廳主邏輯)](https://gitlab.geax.io/demeter/client/document/-/blob/master/Framework/SlotFramework/Lobby/Slot_LobbyManager.md)
    * [Slot_LobbyUI (大廳UI控制腳本)](https://gitlab.geax.io/demeter/client/document/-/blob/master/Framework/SlotFramework/Lobby/Slot_LobbyUI.md)
